org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.widgets.keyboard
Interface ITextInputListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MTTextArea, MTTextField
public interface ITextInputListener

Interface for classes that can be written text to.

Author:
Christopher Ruff

getText

java.lang.String getText()
Returns the text.
NOTE: the text may be different from what was set using setText() since the widget may add its own control characters into the text.

Returns:
the text
